TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit FileResponseElement extends System.Web.Caching.ResponseElement

summary.span: 表示存储为文件的输出缓存项一部分。

span.span: Represents part of an output-cache entry, stored as a file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类表示的输出缓存项 （而不是标头中） 的正文部分。The class represents the body portion (instead of the header) of an output-cache entry. 中的数据对象可以存储为部分或全部文件。The data from a object can be stored as either part or all of a file. ASP.NET 和自定义输出缓存提供程序可以返回响应在多个部分中使用的任意组合对象。Both ASP.NET and custom output-cache providers can return a response in multiple parts, using any combination of objects. 例如，提供程序可以返回一个响应，分段分成以下三个不同对象，以及每个对象都可以在不同的物理文件中检索从偏移量。For example, a provider can return a response that is segmented into three different objects, and each object can be retrieved from an offset into a different physical file.

MemberSignature.Value: public FileResponseElement (string path, long offset, long length);
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string path, int64 offset, int64 length) cil managed
Public Sub New (path As String, offset As Long, length As Long)
public: FileResponseElement(System::String ^ path, long offset, long length);

span.span: The fully qualified path for the file.

param.name: offset
param.span: 文件中字符串开始的位置。

span.span: The position in the file where the string starts.

param.name: length
param.span: 数据的长度，该数据从路径定义的文件中表示输出缓存数据的偏移位置开始。

span.span: The length of the data, starting at the offset that represents the output-cache data in the file defined by path.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果完整的输出缓存响应包含在单个文件中，提供程序初始化通过使用偏移量为零，并且整个文件的大小相等长度的类。If the complete output-cache response is contained in a single file, a provider initializes the class by using an offset of zero, and a length equal to the size of the whole file. 如果完整的输出缓存响应包含在文件部分中，提供程序初始化通过使用中，可启动的输出缓存响应，文件和存储在输出缓存响应的大小相等长度的偏移量的类该文件。If the complete output cache response is contained in only part of a file, a provider initializes the class by using the offset in the file where the output cache response starts, and a length equal to the size of the output-cache response that is stored in that file.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Length As Long
public: property long Length { long get(); };

summary.span: 获取数据的大小，该数据从包含 实例数据的偏移位置开始。

span.span: Gets the size of the data, starting at the offset that contains the data for a instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果完整的输出缓存响应包含在单个文件中，输出缓存提供程序初始化类使用的整个文件的大小相等的长度。If the complete output-cache response is contained in a single file, an output cache provider initializes the class by using a length equal to the size of the whole file. 如果完整的输出缓存响应包含在文件部分中，提供程序初始化类使用的该文件中存储的输出缓存响应的大小相等的长度。If the complete output cache response is contained in only part of a file, a provider initializes the class by using a length equal to the size of the output-cache response that is stored in that file.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Offset As Long
public: property long Offset { long get(); };

summary.span: 获取 实例数据在文件中的起始位置。

span.span: Gets the position in the file where the data from a instance starts.

value.span: 数据在文件中的起始点。

span.span: The starting point of the data in the file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果完整的输出缓存响应包含在单个文件中，提供程序初始化中文件的一部分，仅包含通过使用偏移量为零，如果完整的输出缓存响应的类，提供程序初始化类通过使用输出缓存响应的开始处的文件中的偏移量。If the complete output-cache response is contained in a single file, a provider initializes the class by using an offset of zero, If the complete output cache response is contained in only part of a file, a provider initializes the class by using the offset in the file where the output cache response starts.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Path As String
public: property System::String ^ Path { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取包含 实例数据的文件的位置。

span.span: Gets the location of the file that contains data from a instance.
The fully qualified path of the file.
